response: "Data privacy is a fundamental right! 🚫💻 It's time for companies and governments to take responsibility for protecting our personal information. 🔒👀 We need stricter regulations and harsher penalties for data breaches. 💸😱 Our privacy is not a commodity to be bought and sold. 🙅‍♂️🚫 #DataPrivacy #ProtectOurData"
